decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1606-106, 101 Rev. B, 103 Rev. B, 201 Rev. B, 202 Rev. B, 203 Rev. B, 204 Rev. B, 205 Rev. B, 206 Rev. B, 207 Rev. B, Flood Risk Matrix (unnumbered, no date). Received on 27 July 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Joint application between no 28 & 30 for a ground floor side-infill and rear extension to a terraced property.
